name: FIFTEEN SECONDS
description:
READ ME!!

This is a quick game I made just so that i would get more experience with game development.This is my first 3D game. 

In the game you are stuck in an abandoned Hospital and have no idea how you got there. You got only few second left to leave otherwise the Hospital will..i dunno blow up or whatever u feel will happen.

You got 10 seconds ....just kidding, You got 15 seconds to Find the right Door and escape.

Also use WASD for movement.

Btw there is a door and i am challenging you to Find it.

Goodluck!!
